<div>

#f6f6f6&#125;.markdown-body thead&#123;background:#f6f6f6;color:#000;text-align:left&#125;.markdown-body tr:nth-child(2n)&#123;background-color:rgba(77,208,225,.05)&#125;.markdown-body .task-list-item,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item&#123;list-style:none&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ul,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ul&#123;margin-top:0&#125;.markdown-body ol ol,.markdown-body ol ul,.markdown-body ul ol,.markdown-body ul ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><p>记住，您编写的每一行代码都会有相应的阅读成本。看这代码的人可能是团队的成员，甚至是你未来的自己。</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-0">一、软件设计3R层次结构</h1>
<ul>
<li>readable可读性</li>
<li>reuseable可复用性</li>
<li>refactorable可重构性</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/196910a7df8c436f80cb45073f09ec67~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>关键思想：</p>
<ul>
<li>保持代码一致：一致的风格比“正确”的风格更重要。——编码规范、ESlint</li>
<li>易于阅读和理解：应当使别人理解它所需的时间最小化。——命名、函数式编程</li>
<li>易于维护。——设计模式思想</li>
</ul>
<h1 data-id="heading-1">二、为什么我极力推荐eslint</h1>
<p>据广泛估计，开发人员将70%的代码维护时间花在阅读上以理解它。这真让人大开眼界。居然达到了70%。难怪程序员每天编写的代码行数的平均值大约是10行。我们每天花7个小时来阅读代码，去理解这10行怎么运行！</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">团队合作带来的问题</h2>
<p><strong>看别人的代码</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>团队其他人和自己书写代码的风格不一致，很难去适应别人的编程风格。</li>
<li>甚至一个文件有多个人改动过，有多种编程风格，看着不仅难受，阅读代码也较吃力。</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>改别人的代码</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>代码没有格式化便提交，增加团队成员的阅读成本。</li>
<li>团队成员使用不同的编辑器，每个人都自有一套格式化代码风格，很容易因格式化代码生成多余的改动，从而产生冲突，也不利于解决。</li>
<li>代码提交到git上，由于格式化带来的改动，反而不利于查看这次提交实际改动了哪些代码。</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">eslint解决了什么</h2>
<ul>
<li>不要使用编辑器自带的格式化，用在项目中配置的eslint的规则去格式化代码，团队使用一致的编程风格，会让代码更容易阅读。</li>
<li>设置每次保存的时候就格式化代码，不用每次都手动输入空格或者分号来保持编程风格，也不用每次都手动格式化代码。</li>
<li>每次提交代码，不会因为代码格式化问题产生多余的改动，干净的提交，便于以后查看提交记录解决问题。</li>
</ul>
<p>经过一年多使用eslint的切身体会，我确实感受到eslint的好用之处，以及在团队协作中带来的好处，让你在修改别人写的代码的时候，也不会因为不统一的代码风格难受。</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-4">三、项目中的优化</h1>
<p>下面我们将从代码的易读、性能等方面，举例说明在实际项目中我们可以怎么做来优化我们的代码。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">命名</h2>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/99543b847fdb42ffa9989bd704efa8b5~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p><strong>坏味道</strong>：命名采用缩写。</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：选择具体有实际意义的词，不要用别人看不懂的缩写。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">函数</h2>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/32b52fcaa86240349a6c7baeda8bfead~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">
<strong>坏味道</strong>：函数参数太多，命名模糊。</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：函数参数不要超过2个，超过的话可以考虑用对象传参，获取参数的时候用解构赋值。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/27f00ea313fc47beb30c6a066ba7e732~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">
<strong>坏味道</strong>：函数过大，难于阅读。</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：一个函数只做一件事原则，把代码片段提取出来放入一个独立的函数，这样的好处是函数名也起到了注释的效果，有助于阅读代码，提取出来的函数有助于代码复用。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">值的不变性</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-8">重新赋值</h3>
<p>var/let声明的值可被重新赋值，var可能引起变量提升，带来隐藏的问题。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> x = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
x = <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>const声明的值不可被重新赋值,但如果声明的变量是引用类型，值的内部仍然可被改变</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> x = <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
<span class="hljs-comment">// 试着改变`x`看看!</span>
x = <span class="hljs-number">3</span>;      <span class="hljs-comment">// Error!</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> x = [ <span class="hljs-number">2</span> ];
x[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">3</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// 可以改变</span>
x = [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]; <span class="hljs-comment">// Error!</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：程序中尽量避免var的使用，因为var会带来作用域的问题；用const声明不会被改变的变量。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">值的冻结</h3>
<p>Object.freeze：将一个可变的对象/数组/函数转换成一个“不可变值”，但只针对最顶层。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> x = <span class="hljs-built_in">Object</span>.freeze( [ <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, [<span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>] ] );

<span class="hljs-comment">// 不允许:</span>
x[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">42</span>;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 允许:</span>
x[<span class="hljs-number">2</span>][<span class="hljs-number">0</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">42</span>;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>Object.freeze(..)提供了浅的、单一的不变性，如果您想要一个非常不可变的值，就必须手动遍历整个对象/数组结构，并对每个子对象/数组应用Object.freeze(..)。</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：不会被修改的对象/数组用Object.freeze“冻结”起来。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-10">for循环</h2>
<p>for循环中的代码会在每次循环的时候都会执行，不要在循环里写无意义的代码。</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：</p>
<ul>
<li>将一些操作放在循环体外面</li>
<li>如果要提前进入下一次循环，用continue</li>
<li>如果要提前退出循环，用break</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-11">多个弹窗的情况</h2>
<p>我们页面中有多个弹窗，需要用变量控制弹窗的显示隐藏</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/4d2e6bccc2b1421f8758000bfd57efb6~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p><strong>坏味道</strong>：一个变量控制一个弹窗的显示隐藏，变量数很多，容易混淆哪个变量控制哪个弹窗</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：通过给变量赋值，判断变量是否与值相等来控制弹窗显示隐藏</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-12">合理使用数据结构</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">data</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">total</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">pageSize</span>: <span class="hljs-number">12</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">currentPage</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>,
  &#125;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">data</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">queryInfo</span>: &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">total</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">pageSize</span>: <span class="hljs-number">12</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">currentPage</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>,
    &#125;,
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>坏味道</strong>：数据过于扁平，变量很多</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：把相关功能的几个变量封装在一个对象里面，对象名起到注释作用，说明这些变量的作用</p>
<p>在调后端接口获取数据传参的时候，如果对象的属性和我们要传给接口的参数一直，那么传参的时候只需要传一个对象就可以了，不用再写一遍。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-13">适当复用代码</h2>
<p>DRY（dont repeat yourself）原则。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-14">1.常用工具方法</h3>
<p><strong>坏味道</strong>：在组件里面用到什么方法复制粘贴一遍</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：像格式化时间、判断浏览器类型、防抖节流等等，整理出来放在一个文件里面，导出方法，在用到的地方导入</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/fc7242b39e884ffd8e428d63b8ae5f1e~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-15">2.使用mixins</h3>
<p><strong>坏味道</strong>：在组件把类似功能的代码复制粘贴一遍</p>
<p><strong>推荐</strong>：类似的功能提取出来放在mixins里面，同时也要考虑复用性。比如table相关的变量和方法</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/fe825f4ea9f449678777c20834c5659b~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-16">条件判断</h2>
<p>多重条件，即代码逻辑中有很多条件判断语句，比如if-else分支。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-17">1.使用布尔值的快捷方式</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (isValid === <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>) &#123;&#125;
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (arr.length === <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) &#123;&#125;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (isValid) &#123;&#125;
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!arr.length) &#123;&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-18">2.合理使用三元语句</h3>
<p>简单的两重条件判断可以用三元表达式代替：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (a === b) &#123;
  res = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
&#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
  res = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
res = a === b ? <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> : <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>同时也要避免不必要的三元表达式：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> res = a ? a : b;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> res = a || b;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-19">3.把复杂的条件分支语句提炼成函数</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getPrice = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">price</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> date = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Date</span>();
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (date.getMonth() >= <span class="hljs-number">6</span> && date.getMonth() <= <span class="hljs-number">9</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 夏天</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> price * <span class="hljs-number">0.8</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> price;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> isSummer = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> date = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Date</span>();
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> date.getMonth() >= <span class="hljs-number">6</span> && date.getMonth() <= <span class="hljs-number">9</span>;
&#125;;
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getPrice = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">price</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (isSummer()) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 夏天</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> price * <span class="hljs-number">0.8</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> price;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-20">4.避免条件判断的重复过程</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 惰性加载函数</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> addEvent = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">elem, type, handler</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.addEventListener) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem.addEventListener(type, handler, <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>);
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.attachEvent) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> elem.attachEvent(<span class="hljs-string">"on"</span> + type, handler);
  &#125;
&#125;;
<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> addEvent = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">ele, type, handler</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.addEventListener) &#123;
    addEvent = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">ele, type, handler</span>) </span>&#123;
      ele.addEventListener(ele, type, handler, <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>);
    &#125;;
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">window</span>.attachEvent) &#123;
    addEvent = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">ele, type, handler</span>) </span>&#123;
      ele.addEventListener(ele, type, handler);
    &#125;;
  &#125;

  addEvent(ele, type, handler);
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-21">5.巧用return</h3>
<p>1.提前return</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> del = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">obj</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> ret;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!obj.isReadOnly) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 不为只读的才能被删除</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (obj.isFolder) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果是文件夹</span>
      ret = deleteFolder(obj);
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (obj.isFile) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果是文件</span>
      ret = deleteFile(obj);
    &#125;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ret;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> del = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">obj</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (obj.isReadOnly) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 反转 if 表达式</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (obj.isFolder) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> deleteFolder(obj);
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (obj.isFile) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> deleteFile(obj);
  &#125;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>优点</strong>：</p>
<ul>
<li>更少的嵌套，看起来更简洁</li>
<li>程序不用再往下执行</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>缺点</strong>：提前返回导致函数有多个输出，可能难以读取函数以了解其输出行为，在流控制结构（if逻辑等等）中，会导致代码可读性更差。</p>
<p>现在大多数文章都在推崇尽可能早的return，但我们也不应该忽视它可能会带来的问题，所以在实际项目中，我们也要合理选择在什么时候return。</p>
<p>2.用return退出多重循环</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> func = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> flag = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i < <span class="hljs-number">10</span>; i++) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> j = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; j < <span class="hljs-number">10</span>; j++) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (i * j > <span class="hljs-number">30</span>) &#123;
        flag = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
      &#125;
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (flag === <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
    &#125;
  &#125;
  
  <span class="hljs-comment">// do something</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(i);
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> print = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">i</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(i);
&#125;;
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> func = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i < <span class="hljs-number">10</span>; i++) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> j = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; j < <span class="hljs-number">10</span>; j++) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (i * j > <span class="hljs-number">30</span>) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> print(i);
      &#125;
    &#125;
  &#125;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-22">6.if-else的替代写法</h3>
<p>实际项目中的例子：
<img src="https://p1-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/8f5dccc852a3427686a8ac7eecc07e3a~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="image.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">
程序中大量的if-else阅读起来比较吃力，但实际我们可以有很多写法来代替。下面会举例一些场景的代码，再结合设计模式中的一些思想，说说怎么处理这些多重条件的情况更好。</p>
<h4 data-id="heading-23">6.1 策略模式</h4>
<p>定义：定义一系列的算法，把它们一个个封装起来，并且使它们可以相互替换。</p>
<p>JavaScript语言的特性，决定了我们实用策略模式很简单。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">travel</span>(<span class="hljs-params">type</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (type === <span class="hljs-string">"plane"</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">//...</span>
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (type === <span class="hljs-string">"train"</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">//...</span>
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (type === <span class="hljs-string">"bus"</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">//...</span>
  &#125;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">travel</span>(<span class="hljs-params">type</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> options = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">plane</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">train</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">bus</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;&#125;,
  &#125;;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> options[type]();
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-24">6.2 迭代器模式</h4>
<p>定义：提供一种方法顺序访问一个聚合对象中的各个元素，而又不需要暴露该对象的内部表示，又叫遍历器。</p>
<p>Array.prototype.includes采用的就是迭代器的思想：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (color === <span class="hljs-string">"red"</span> || color === <span class="hljs-string">"green"</span> || color === <span class="hljs-string">"blue"</span>) &#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(color + <span class="hljs-string">"属于三原色"</span>);
&#125;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ([<span class="hljs-string">"red"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"green"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"blue"</span>].includes(color)) &#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(color + <span class="hljs-string">"属于三原色"</span>);
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>我们再看一个更复杂的文件上传例子</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 迭代器实现 上传文件</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// 坏味道</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getUploadObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> ActiveXObject(<span class="hljs-string">"TXFTNActiveX.FTNUpload"</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// IE 上传控件</span>
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (e) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (supportFlash()) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// supportFlash 函数未提供</span>
      <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> str = <span class="hljs-string">'<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></object>'</span>;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> $(str).appendTo($(<span class="hljs-string">"body"</span>));
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> str = <span class="hljs-string">'<input name="file" type="file"/>'</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// 表单上传</span>
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> $(str).appendTo($(<span class="hljs-string">"body"</span>));
    &#125;
  &#125;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 推荐</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getActiveUploadObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> ActiveXObject(<span class="hljs-string">"EXFTNActiveX.FTNUpload"</span>);
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (e) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
  &#125;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getFlashUploadObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (supportFlash()) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> str = <span class="hljs-string">'<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></object>'</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> $(str).appendTo($(<span class="hljs-string">"body"</span>));
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getFormUpladObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> str = <span class="hljs-string">'<input name="file" type="file" class="ui-file"/>'</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">// 表单上传</span>
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> $(str).appendTo($(<span class="hljs-string">"body"</span>));
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-built_in">Function</span>.prototype.after = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">fn</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> self = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> ret = self.apply(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!ret) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> fn.apply(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>);
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ret;
  &#125;;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> uploadObj = iteratorUploadObj(
  getActiveUploadObj,
  getFlashUploadObj,
  getFormUpladObj
);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>其中迭代器可以这样去实现</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 迭代器</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> iteratorUploadObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, fn; (fn = <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>[i++]); ) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> uploadObj = fn();
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (uploadObj !== <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> uploadObj;
    &#125;
  &#125;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-25">6.3 职责链模式</h4>
<p>定义：使多个对象都有机会处理请求，从而避免请求的发送者和接收者之间 的耦合关系，将这些对象连成一条链，并沿着这条链传递该请求，直到有一个对象处理它为止。</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/6435bea053054b6baf242ac05fd480ae~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>我们利用after去实现职责链</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-built_in">Function</span>.prototype.after = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">fn</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> _this = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> ret = _this.apply(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.arguments);
    fn.apply(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>, <span class="hljs-built_in">arguments</span>);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ret;
  &#125;;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>同样是上面那个文件上传的例子，用迭代器模式这样实现</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 职责链模式</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getActiveUploadObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> ActiveXObject(<span class="hljs-string">"TXFTNActiveX.FTNUpload"</span>); <span class="hljs-comment">// IE 上传控件</span>
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (e) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">"nextSuccessor"</span>;
  &#125;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getFlashUploadObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (supportFlash()) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> str = <span class="hljs-string">'<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></object>'</span>;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> $(str).appendTo($(<span class="hljs-string">"body"</span>));
  &#125;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">"nextSuccessor"</span>;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getFormUpladObj = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> $(<span class="hljs-string">'<form><input name="file" type="file"/></form>'</span>).appendTo($(<span class="hljs-string">"body"</span>));
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> getUploadObj = getActiveUploadObj
  .after(getFlashUploadObj)
  .after(getFormUpladObj);

<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(getUploadObj());
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-26">6.4 状态模式</h4>
<p>定义：允许一个对象在其内部状态改变时改变它的行为，对象看起来似乎修改了它的类。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">Light.prototype.buttonWasPressed = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state === <span class="hljs-string">"off"</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"弱光"</span>);
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state = <span class="hljs-string">"weakLight"</span>;
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state === <span class="hljs-string">"weakLight"</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"强光"</span>);
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state = <span class="hljs-string">"strongLight"</span>;
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state === <span class="hljs-string">"strongLight"</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"关灯"</span>);
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state = <span class="hljs-string">"off"</span>;
  &#125;
&#125;;

<span class="hljs-comment">// 状态模式</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> Light = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.currState = FSM.off; <span class="hljs-comment">// 设置当前状态</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.button = <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>;
&#125;;
Light.prototype.press = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.currState.buttonWasPressed.call(self); <span class="hljs-comment">// 把请求委托给 FSM 状态机</span>
&#125;;
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> FSM = &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attr">off</span>: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">buttonWasPressed</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
      <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"弱光"</span>);
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.currState = <span class="hljs-string">"weakLight"</span>;
    &#125;,
  &#125;,
  <span class="hljs-attr">weakLight</span>: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">buttonWasPressed</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
      <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"强光"</span>);
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.currState = <span class="hljs-string">"strongLight"</span>;
    &#125;,
  &#125;,
  <span class="hljs-attr">strongLight</span>: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">buttonWasPressed</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
      <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"关灯"</span>);
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.currState = <span class="hljs-string">"off"</span>;
    &#125;,
  &#125;,
&#125;;
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> light = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Light();
light.press();
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h1 data-id="heading-27">四、团队需要完善的地方</h1>
<ol>
<li>团队编码规范</li>
<li>eslint统一规范</li>
<li>定期code review</li>
</ol>
